allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$bytes = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllBytes\(''C:\\Program Files \(x86\)\\NetDevil\\Auto Assault\\exe\\autoassault.exe''\); $text = [System.Text.Encoding]::ASCII.GetString\($bytes\); $matches = [regex]::Matches\($text, ''SVOG[A-Za-z0-9_]+''\); $matches | ForEach-Object { $_Value } | Sort-Object -Unique | Select-Object -First 30")
